SQLResource.query: SELECT COMP_CD , ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , ITEM_DIV , ORD_SALE_DIV , ORG_CLASS_CD , L_CLASS_CD , M_CLASS_CD , S_CLASS_CD , D_CLASS_CD , USE_YN FROM ( SELECT IC.COMP_CD , IC.ITEM_CD , I.ITEM_NM , I.ITEM_DIV , I.ORD_SALE_DIV , IC.ORG_CLASS_CD , IC.L_CLASS_CD , IC.M_CLASS_CD , IC.S_CLASS_CD , IC.D_CLASS_CD , NVL(IC.USE_YN, 'N') AS USE_YN FROM ( SELECT COMP_CD , ITEM_CD , ORG_CLASS_CD , L_CLASS_CD , M_CLASS_CD , S_CLASS_CD , D_CLASS_CD , USE_YN FROM ITEM_CLASS WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND ORG_CLASS_CD = ${SCH_ORG_CLASS_CD} AND (${SCH_L_CLASS_CD} IS NULL OR L_CLASS_CD = ${SCH_L_CLASS_CD}) AND (${SCH_M_CLASS_CD} IS NULL OR M_CLASS_CD = ${SCH_M_CLASS_CD}) AND (${SCH_S_CLASS_CD} IS NULL OR S_CLASS_CD = ${SCH_S_CLASS_CD}) AND (${SCH_D_CLASS_CD} IS NULL OR D_CLASS_CD = ${SCH_D_CLASS_CD}) ) IC , ( SELECT I.COMP_CD , I.ITEM_CD , NVL(L.ITEM_NM, I.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , I.ITEM_DIV , I.ORD_SALE_DIV FROM ITEM I , ( SELECT COMP_CD , ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM FROM LANG_ITEM WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE I.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND I.ITEM_CD = L.ITEM_CD(+) AND I.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND I.USE_YN = 'Y' ) I WHERE IC.COMP_CD = I.COMP_CD AND IC.ITEM_CD = I.ITEM_CD AND (${SCH_USE_YN} IS NULL OR NVL(IC.USE_YN, 'N') = ${SCH_USE_YN}) ) I WHERE (${SCH_ITEM_TXT} IS NULL OR (I.ITEM_CD LIKE '%'||${SCH_ITEM_TXT}||'%' OR I.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'||${SCH_ITEM_TXT}||'%')) ORDER BY I.ITEM_CD
